detectors.description:
KickTheCoin.clear() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#291-299) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- houseAddress.transfer(this.balance) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#297)
detectors.markdown:
[KickTheCoin.clear()](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#L291-L299) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [houseAddress.transfer(this.balance)](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#L297)

detectors.description:
KickTheCoin.changeOwner(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#230-235) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = _newOwner (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#234)

KickTheCoin.changeGameParameters(uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#251-257) should emit an event for: 
	- costToKickTheCoin = _costToKickTheCoin (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#255) 
	- numberOfBlocksPerKick = _numberOfBlocksPerKick (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#256)

KickTheCoin.airDrop(address).player (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#168) lacks a zero-check on :
		- player.transfer(1) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/eed895573a8542173656027607cf006d72b478b1_KickTheCoin.sol#173)
solc-0.4.15 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.15 is not recommended for deployment
